# October 02, 2025 to November 01, 2025 (30 days) News Period

## News Review for automationedge

# AutomationEdge News Review

## Executive Summary

AutomationEdge unveiled its Agentic AI capabilities at the Global Fintech Festival 2025 in Mumbai, marking the company's evolution beyond traditional RPA into autonomous AI agents specifically designed for the BFSI sector. The launch included the introduction of the Agentic AI V-Co-Create programme, a collaborative initiative allowing select BFSI organizations to co-develop tailored solutions while gaining early access to the technology. The platform features autonomous agents capable of managing complex workflows with minimal oversight, self-learning compliance systems, real-time data-driven decision-making, and end-to-end document processing automation, all integrated with LLM-driven cognition and layered data processing. Industry endorsements came from senior banking executives including Dhananjay Tambe, Chairman of NSDL Payments Bank and former Deputy Managing Director of State Bank of India, who served as guest of honour at the launch event, along with support from Prasanna Lohar of Union Bank of India and Vikrant Ponkshe, former CEO of Cosmos Bank, positioning AutomationEdge as a transformation enabler for mission-critical banking operations. [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

## Key Developments

**Product Launch**: AutomationEdge launched its Agentic AI platform at Global Fintech Festival 2025, featuring autonomous agents for complex workflow management, self-learning compliance systems, real-time data-driven decisions, and end-to-end document processing automation with LLM-driven cognition integration. [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

**Strategic Partnership Program**: The company introduced the Agentic AI V-Co-Create programme, a limited-time collaborative initiative allowing select BFSI organizations to co-develop tailored solutions and gain early access to Agentic AI technologies with direct input into product innovation. [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

**Market Positioning**: AutomationEdge positioned itself as moving beyond traditional RPA and conventional AI into autonomous agent territory, specifically targeting the BFSI sector's need for intelligent automation and compliance management. [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

## Market Context

The launch represents AutomationEdge's response to the BFSI industry's evolution toward requiring autonomous AI capabilities for competitive advantage. The company is positioning itself in the emerging market of agentic AI solutions, moving beyond traditional document processing into autonomous workflow management and compliance automation specifically tailored for banking and financial services organizations.

## Notable Quotes

**Prasad Patwa, co-founder & COO of AutomationEdge**: "With Agentic AI, we're not only introducing a new wave of intelligent automation but also fostering true collaboration with the industry through our Agentic AI V-Co-Create program. Our mission is to empower BFSI organisations to reimagine workflows, drive digital transformation, and achieve unprecedented levels of agility and innovation." [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

**Dhananjay Tambe, Chairman of NSDL Payments Bank and former Deputy Managing Director of State Bank of India**: "The BFSI industry is evolving rapidly and must harness the power of Agentic AI to stay ahead. AutomationEdge's Agentic AI solutions will be instrumental in helping leading organisations unlock new growth opportunities and redefine excellence in service delivery." [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

**Prasanna Lohar, CEO at Future Transformation & Innovation and Transformation Advisor at Union Bank of India**: "Agentic AI by AutomationEdge offers BFSI organisations a secure, scalable platform for intelligent automation. As AI becomes essential, Agentic AI enables mission-critical banking transformation. Let's scale this innovation from India to the world." [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

**Vikrant Ponkshe, former Managing Director and CEO of Cosmos Bank and Chief Executive Catalyst at Being Catalyst**: "It's inspiring to witness AutomationEdge propel the industry beyond RPA and conventional AI into the era of Agentic Bots, a transformative leap that redefines how enterprises think, learn, and act. By blending institutional knowledge with the boundless reach of global intelligence through layered data and LLM-driven cognition, AutomationEdge is unlocking the true potential of Agentic AI." [Source](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

## Strategic Implications

AutomationEdge's launch of Agentic AI represents a strategic evolution from traditional document processing and RPA services toward autonomous AI agents, positioning the company to capture market share in the emerging agentic AI space within the BFSI sector. The co-creation programme approach allows the company to develop industry-specific solutions while building deeper partnerships with key financial institutions, potentially creating competitive moats through customized implementations. The strong industry endorsements from senior banking executives suggest AutomationEdge has successfully positioned itself as a trusted partner for mission-critical banking transformation, which could accelerate adoption and provide reference customers for broader market expansion.

## Individual Articles

### Article 1: AutomationEdge unveils Agentic AI at GFF 2025, launches Agentic AI V-Co-Create programme for select BFSI organisations

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/artificial-intelligence/automationedge-unveils-agentic-ai-at-gff-2025-launches-agentic-ai-v-co-create-programme-for-select-bfsi-organisations/articleshow/124628138.cms)

## Summary

AutomationEdge launched its Agentic AI capabilities at Global Fintech Festival 2025, targeting BFSI sector automation with autonomous agents that manage complex workflows with minimal oversight, self-learning compliance systems, and end-to-end document processing. The company introduced the Agentic AI V-Co-Create programme, allowing select BFSI organizations to co-develop tailored solutions while gaining early access to the technology. Industry executives including Dhananjay Tambe from NSDL Payments Bank and advisors from Union Bank of India endorsed the platform's potential for mission-critical banking transformation. AutomationEdge positions itself as moving beyond traditional RPA into LLM-driven autonomous agents, with existing customers receiving priority access to the new capabilities.

## Executive Insights

**Prasad Patwa, co-founder & COO of AutomationEdge**

> "With Agentic AI, we're not only introducing a new wave of intelligent automation but also fostering true collaboration with the industry through our Agentic AI V-Co-Create program. Our mission is to empower BFSI organisations to reimagine workflows, drive digital transformation, and achieve unprecedented levels of agility and innovation."

*Context: Discussing the launch of Agentic AI and co-creation programme*

*Significance: Reveals AutomationEdge's strategic focus on collaborative development and BFSI digital transformation*

**Dhananjay Tambe, Chairman of NSDL Payments Bank and former Deputy Managing Director of State Bank of India**

> "The BFSI industry is evolving rapidly and must harness the power of Agentic AI to stay ahead. AutomationEdge's Agentic AI solutions will be instrumental in helping leading organisations unlock new growth opportunities and redefine excellence in service delivery."

*Context: Speaking as guest of honour at the GFF 2025 launch event*

*Significance: Industry endorsement from senior banking executive validates AutomationEdge's BFSI market strategy*

**Prasanna Lohar, CEO at Future Transformation & Innovation and Transformation Advisor at Union Bank of India**

> "Agentic AI by AutomationEdge offers BFSI organisations a secure, scalable platform for intelligent automation. As AI becomes essential, Agentic AI enables mission-critical banking transformation. Let's scale this innovation from India to the world."

*Context: Commenting on AutomationEdge's Agentic AI capabilities*

*Significance: Banking industry executive endorsement emphasizing security and scalability for mission-critical operations*

**Vikrant Ponkshe, former Managing Director and CEO of Cosmos Bank and Chief Executive Catalyst at Being Catalyst**

> "It's inspiring to witness AutomationEdge propel the industry beyond RPA and conventional AI into the era of Agentic Bots, a transformative leap that redefines how enterprises think, learn, and act. By blending institutional knowledge with the boundless reach of global intelligence through layered data and LLM-driven cognition, AutomationEdge is unlocking the true potential of Agentic AI."

*Context: Discussing AutomationEdge's evolution beyond traditional RPA*

*Significance: Industry leader recognition of AutomationEdge's technological advancement and LLM integration approach*
